attributes.comment: CMS should also establish the rules engine that help validate the accuracy of the submitted data but also the completeness of the data.  This rules engine should do a quick check against the state licensing authorities to validate the healthcare provider data and also ensure the conformance to the developed data standard.  This is based on the program that was implemented to share information between Public Safety and Public Health for incarcerated population that is receiving treatment during incarceration and after being released back into the community.
